original_text: Once when Jesus was praying in private and his disciples were with him, he asked them, “Who do the crowds say I am?”
korean_text: 예수께서 따로 기도하실 때에 제자들이 주와 함께 있더니 물어 이르시되 무리가 나를 누구라고 하느냐

sentences.original_text: Once when Jesus was praying in private
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 때 예수께서 기도하시려고 따로 계실 때

sentences.original_text: and his disciples were with him
Who do the crowds say I am?
